name: cozychat
0:
”Alexa, ask cozy chat on how to fix the network problem of Cozyla Smart Frame.”
”Alexa, ask cozy chat to suggest the best gift for a 10 years old boy”
”Alexa, ask cozy chat to introduce the best scene in Hawaii”
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: cozy chat
Developer Terms of Use
des: We currently support the Cozyla Album command to chat and provide answer to device related questions via OpenAI's ChatGPT and Dall-E Image API. More features will be added soon.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
